awd_abstract_narration: A high voltage laboratory is being developed that permits                  students to better integrate theoretical electrostatics with                    physical systems.  The laboratory will expose students to high                  voltage phenomena, measurement techniques and practical                         applications of electrostatics.  Students will also learn high                  voltage safety practices, and the laboratory will provide a                     experimental facility for senior design projects related to high                voltage phenomena and equipment.  Equipment consists of AC and DC               high voltage power supplies, measurement instruments, a special                 purpose close range telescope, high voltage insulators, a set of                conducting spheres and a high voltage capacitor.                                                                                                                     This project is being matched by an amount equal to the                    award.
